content.raw:
Hi,

1. Using Ubuntu 16.04
2. Installed ROS Kinetic with Gazebo
3. Validated Gazebo with rosrun gazebo_ros gazebo. GUI is up , no issues here
4. Installed turtlebot sudo apt-get install ros-kinetic-turtlebot-gazebo
5. source /opt/ros/kinetic/setup.bash
6. Rosrun on 1 terminal
7. roslaunch turtlebot_gazebo turtlebot_world.launch on another error below - appears depthimage_to_laser scan "component is not installed.
8. roslaunch turtlebot_teleop keyboard_teleop.launch . am able to teleoperate. 
 How do I get this component, why did I miss it ??!!

```
[ERROR] [1489263949.157465078, 0.240000000]: Failed to load nodelet [/depthimage_to_laserscan] of type [depthimage_to_laserscan/DepthImageToLaserScanNodelet] even after refreshing the cache: Failed to load library /opt/ros/kinetic/lib//libDepthImageToLaserScanNodelet.so. Make sure that you are calling the PLUGINLIB_EXPORT_CLASS macro in the library code, and that names are consistent between this macro and your XML. Error string: Could not load library (Poco exception = libopencv_core3.so.3.2: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory)
[ERROR] [1489263949.157581400, 0.240000000]: The error before refreshing the cache was: Failed to load library /opt/ros/kinetic/lib//libDepthImageToLaserScanNodelet.so. Make sure that you are calling the PLUGINLIB_EXPORT_CLASS macro in the library code, and that names are consistent between this macro and your XML. Error string: Could not load library (Poco exception = libopencv_core3.so.3.2: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory)
[FATAL] [1489263949.157764466, 0.240000000]: Failed to load nodelet '/depthimage_to_laserscan` of type `depthimage_to_laserscan/DepthImageToLaserScanNodelet` to manager `laserscan_nodelet_manager'
[spawn_turtlebot_model-3] process has finished cleanly
log file: /home/schidamb/.ros/log/3945d270-0695-11e7-8dc0-00212f35542b/spawn_turtlebot_model-3*.log
[depthimage_to_laserscan-9] process has died [pid 6342, exit code 255, cmd /opt/ros/kinetic/lib/nodelet/nodelet load depthimage_to_laserscan/DepthImageToLaserScanNodelet laserscan_nodelet_manager image:=/camera/depth/image_raw scan:=/scan __name:=depthimage_to_laserscan __log:=/home/schidamb/.ros/log/3945d270-0695-11e7-8dc0-00212f35542b/depthimage_to_laserscan-9.log].
log file: /home/schidamb/.ros/log/3945d270-0695-11e7-8dc0-00212f35542b/depthimage_to_laserscan-9*.log
```
content.html:
Hi,

  1. Using Ubuntu 16.04
  2. Installed ROS Kinetic with Gazebo
  3. Validated Gazebo with rosrun gazebo_ros gazebo. GUI is up , no issues here
  4. Installed turtlebot sudo apt-get install ros-kinetic-turtlebot-gazebo
  5. source /opt/ros/kinetic/setup.bash
  6. Rosrun on 1 terminal
  7. roslaunch turtlebot_gazebo turtlebot_world.launch on another error below - appears depthimage_to_laser scan "component is not installed.
  8. roslaunch turtlebot_teleop keyboard_teleop.launch . am able to teleoperate. How do I get this component, why did I miss it ??!!
[ERROR] [1489263949.157465078, 0.240000000]: Failed to load nodelet [/depthimage_to_laserscan] of type [depthimage_to_laserscan/DepthImageToLaserScanNodelet] even after refreshing the cache: Failed to load library /opt/ros/kinetic/lib//libDepthImageToLaserScanNodelet.so. Make sure that you are calling the PLUGINLIB_EXPORT_CLASS macro in the library code, and that names are consistent between this macro and your XML. Error string: Could not load library (Poco exception = libopencv_core3.so.3.2: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory)
[ERROR] [1489263949.157581400, 0.240000000]: The error before refreshing the cache was: Failed to load library /opt/ros/kinetic/lib//libDepthImageToLaserScanNodelet.so. Make sure that you are calling the PLUGINLIB_EXPORT_CLASS macro in the library code, and that names are consistent between this macro and your XML.
